alert.note: Alert for Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area; Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties; Northern Washoe County; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 12:53PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...Strong Thunderstorms Expected this Afternoon Over Western Nevada and the Surprise Valley... Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms near Fernley, Silver Springs, and Hawthorne, traveling north at 40 mph. More storms are expected to develop across the region through the afternoon. Main threats will be strong winds in excess of 40 mph, brief heavy rainfall, cloud-to-ground lightning, and small hail. Locations impacted include... Reno, Carson City, Fallon, Lovelock, Lake City, Gardnerville, Virginia City, Pyramid Lake, Lahontan Reservoir, Gerlach, Cedarville, Topaz Lake, Sparks, Gardnerville Ranchos, Fernley, Dayton, Johnson Lane, Hawthorne, Yerington and Northwest Reno. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area; Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties; Northern Washoe County; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
